summary: A new final page component and route were added (/beginning), and both the top navigation and sequential pager were updated to include it as the last step. However, the diff does not show the newly uploaded PNG files being added under frontend/public/assets/uploads, and the final page gallery only references 4 images rather than all required uploaded PNGs. An extra user-facing subtitle line was also added that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly uploaded images as frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/uploads so they can be referenced by filename via /assets/uploads/<filename> (including all listed PNGs; deduplicate repeated 1771025145088-1.png without breaking references); no backend image serving.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show any new files added under frontend/public/assets/uploads (only a TSX page was added and several TS/TSX files modified). Therefore the required PNG assetsâ€™ presence in the public folder is not evidenced.
evidence: File diff summary shows only: ADDED frontend/src/pages/Page5Final.tsx; no additions under frontend/public/assets/uploads

missing_requirements.requirement: On the new final page, include a simple responsive gallery (or equivalent) that displays the newly uploaded PNG images using /assets/uploads/<filename> paths, responsive on mobile/desktop, with at least one interaction path (e.g., click to enlarge) working.
missing_requirements.reason: The new final page references only 4 images (1771025145088.png, 1771025927131.png, 1771025946100.png, 1771025953219.png) and does not include the rest of the required uploaded PNGs (e.g., -1/-2 variants). So it does not display the newly uploaded PNG images set as specified.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/Page5Final.tsx (comicPhotos array includes only 4 src entries)

hallucinated_features.description: Added extra user-facing subtitle text on the final page: "The beginning of our beautiful journey".
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only specified that the page must display the exact text "this is where it all started"; it did not request additional tagline text on that page.

with "The beginning of our beautiful journey")
